author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Flight forced to emergency land at CardiffTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Flight forced to emergency land at Cardiff Published on : Sunday, September 20, 2015
A commercial flight carrying about 200 passengers was forced to make an emergency landing at Cardiff Airport.
Thomson flight TOM6555 was heading into Cardiff from Tenerife in the early hours of Saturday morning when it was struck by a problem.
The airport said it had its emergency team on standby but they were stood down after the plane landed safely at about 03:15 BST.
Thomson management has been asked to comment.
